object.name: training
object.property: <model xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="estimated_duration" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <default>120</default> <description>What is the duration in minutes of your training ?</description> <title>Estimated duration</title> </field> <field name="preferred_period" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <default>Morning</default> <description>Your preferred period of day to your training</description> <title>Preferred period</title> <values> <element>Morning</element> <element>Afternoon</element> <element>None</element> </values> </field> <field name="language_talk" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <default>English</default> <description>What language do you will speak to us ?</description> <title>Language</title> <values> <element>English</element> <element>Spanish</element> <element>Portuguese</element> </values> </field> <field name="infrastructure_requirements" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>What you need to have in the classroom ?</description> <required>False</required> <title>Infrastructure's requirements</title> </field> <field name="global_theme" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <default>Entrepreneurship</default> <description>What is the subject of your training</description> <title>Global theme</title> <values> <element>Entrepreneurship</element> <element>Django</element> <element>Pyramid</element> <element>Scipy</element> <element>Plone</element> <element>Web Development</element> <element>Mobility and Embedded Systems</element> <element>Enterprise and Management</element> <element>Community and Education</element> <element>Cloud, System Administration and Networks</element> <element>Media and Networks</element> </values> </field> <field name="level" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <default>Basic</default> <description>What is the general level of your training ?</description> <title>Level</title> <values> <element>Basic</element> <element>Intermediate</element> <element>Advanced</element> </values> </field> <field name="observations" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>Do you want to give us any other information ?</description> <required>False</required> <title>Observations</title> </field> </schema> </model>
